title: Trading Platform: Password Change (response)
description: The result of the Trading Platform password change.

trading_platform_password_change.title: trading_platform_password_change
trading_platform_password_change.description: If set to 1, the password has been updated.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
